diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AN$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $30$ units.
The length of the line $CN$ is $5$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $N$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $CN$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AN$, $BC$, $BN$, and $CN$ forming the triangle and its extensions.
